thread.title: Chicago Cubs-St. Louis Cardinals in NLDS Game 4: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Chicago Cubs-St. Louis Cardinals in NLDS Game 4: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Chicago Cubs-St. Louis Cardinals in NLDS Game 4: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
The St. Louis Cardinals and Chicago Cubs resume their best-of-five National League Division Series with Tuesday's Game 4 in Chicago.
The Cubs lead the series 2-1 and will advance to the National League Championship Series with another win.
Here are details on how to watch and listen to the game online:
What : St. Louis Cardinals at Chicago Cubs in NLDS Game 4. Chicago leads series 2-1.
Where : Wrigley Field, Chicago
When : Tuesday, October 13, at 1:37 p.m. PT/4:37 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online live stream : Watch online at WatchTBS or listen at ESPNRadio.com
Pitching matchup : St. Louis' John Lackey vs. Chicago's Jason Hammel
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
